channel.title: How do I change
channel.description: starting point, starting outfit and what NPCS say plz help ill give co on my server and you get an npc decitaded to you i know its not a great offer but i need a lil help pl0xies thankks, ;D :D

item.title: How do I change
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

in player.java look for teleportToX =
then there should be somethihng like

teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;

replace those with your new coords

hope this helps

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

i player/server.java look for the item code you start off with and press ctrl+f

when thats done,you should see a few things,just replace the item codes with the ones you want.

with the starting place,go into server.java,when your there type in your existing starting coordinates,

when you find them,replace them with the ones you want

and with npc’s,go into npchandler.java,and type in a word that an npc already says,and edit it to what you want it to say.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change

item.description:

lol…change what players start with in player/server.java and edit what npc’s say in npchandler.java
